entry.title: Proposed homeless camp fails to get commission approval
entry.summary: A proposal to locate a campground for the homeless on Northeast Winchester Street in Roseburg was scuttled by the city’s Homeless Commission on Monday following a public meeting in which speaker after speaker railed against the idea.

entry.title: Homeless Commission shelves plans for Winchester Street camp following public outcry

entry.title: RPS TO DISTRIBUTE FREE MEALS OVER WINTER BREAK
entry.summary: December 11, 2023 3:20 a.m. Roseburg Public Schools will distribute free meals to children and youth over the winter break via the LunchBox Express bus. An RPS release said the meals are available to those age 18 and younger and will be distributed Monday through Friday December 18-22 and Wednesday through Friday December 27-29. Times...
